content:
That's not the point.
The point is, you must have met lots of new Neighbors out there who want to move in, right?
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
For the Astralink station, I want a
thi——s huge parking lot.
       <size=30>Even bigger than the one in Metropolis.</size>
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Yeah! It's so much fun when friends huddle together!
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Are there many? I don't think so...
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Right here, yes!
In this tiny little spot,
We've managed to build the Camp, the Omni-Gallery, and three houses!
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Alright! No refusing,
That's what I'm talking about! I believe in you.
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Don't play dumb! I'm putting my foot down. You're definitely going to invite more new Neighbors, and at this rate, we won't have any parking spots left!
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Five cars are parked here!
I mean!
Oh wait, Frostia doesn't have a car, so five minus one...
info: 站点畅想-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: I know you believe the more, the merrier, but at this rate, we'll run out of space to park!
